name: UTM-CSIC Data Centre Catalogue
description: Catalog of spatial data acquired during oceanographic cruises on board Spanish CSIC research vessels and RV Hespérides, aiming to disseminate data and metadata, and provide access to interoperable data following FAIR principles. Includes metadata from more than 700 cruises carried out since 1979, with links to cruise documentation, navigation maps, and datasets.
owner_name: Unit of Marine Technology - Spanish National Research Council (UTM-CSIC)
